name: Transcript Designer
description: Generates and optimizes a DNA transcript for a given protein sequence. Ensures codon optimization, GC content, and removal of forbidden sequences, tailored for S. cerevisiae.

inputs.name: protein
inputs.description: The input protein sequence for which a DNA transcript will be designed. The sequence should use standard amino acid single-letter codes.

outputs.name: optimized_dna
outputs.description: The optimized DNA sequence for the input protein.

outputs.name: optimization_summary
outputs.description: A summary of the constraints and objectives applied during optimization, including any constraints that were not satisfied.
